thread.title: Andrea Bocelli Debuts Music Video for Ariana Grande Duet 'E Piu Ti Penso'
thread.title_full: Andrea Bocelli Debuts Music Video for Ariana Grande Duet 'E Piu Ti Penso'

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Andrea Bocelli Debuts Music Video for Ariana Grande Duet 'E Piu Ti Penso'
text:
Comments Bocelli and Grande show off their impressive vocals while in Rome and Tokyo, respectively. 
After being teased last week, the official music video for Andrea Bocelli and Ariana Grande 's "E Piu Ti Penso" finally arrived online in full on Tuesday, October 13. The clip mostly centers on the two superstars as they show off their amazing vocals while they're in two different cities. Bocelli is seen hitting various places in Rome, Italy like the Saint Angelo Castle. Miles away from him, his collaborator belts out her lines from a balcony somewhere in Tokyo, Japan. The video also offers gorgeous shots from the two countries. "E Piu Ti Penso" was originally featured on the soundtrack of the 1984 film "Once Upon a Time In America". Bocelli and Grande's cover will appear on his forthcoming album " Cinema " that's due out on October 23. Grande is currently also promoting her own music. She's scheduled to drop her new single called "Focus" on October 30. The song will lead her third album, " Moonlight ", which has yet to have an official release date.
